details:
A security vulnerability has been discovered in ldns, a library and
collection of utilities for DNS programming.


* [CVE-2017-1000231](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2017-1000231)
The generic parser contained a double-free vulnerability which
 resulted in an application crash with unspecified impacts and attack
 vectors.


For Debian 7 Wheezy, these problems have been fixed in version
1.6.13-1+deb7u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your ldns packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
